p: For the proper management of these by-products, it is necessary a decisive change for the agri-food system. The circular economy promises to be an efficient option in the medium and long term to prevent, reuse, or recover natural resources and derived by-products [ 15]. The goal is to re-introduce the by-products to the production line as raw material for obtaining new products with high health benefits and added value in the industry through sustainable technology to extract nutritional components [ 16].
